overview: Christopher Daniels chose without any hesitation Lucas Entertainment as the studio for his Bareback Premiere in gay porn movies! Don't worry: a worthy roster of hot men is assembled to push Christopher to his ass-fucking limits, including Sebastian Young, Marcus Isaacs, and Nick Gavin. And because he has an insatiable appetite for pounding the hell out of hot men, Sebastian Young returns to show Addison Graham a thing or two about being a submissive bottom for a power top!
title: Christopher Daniels' Bareback Premiere
